original: Liljeholm, Adolf Filip, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 5/11/83 i Gbg av överlär. A. F. L. o. Hanna Öhrn. G. 22 m. Karin Linder. Barn: Kerstin f. 25, Barbro 26, Elisabeth 37. — Mog:-ex. v. Gbgs h. latin 02, fil. kand. i Upps. 07, fil. lic. i Gbg 25, provår v. Gbgs h. real 27. Vik. adj. v. Gbgs h. latin 08-09, lär. v. Gustafsbergs sk. 22-24, vik. adj. i Gbg 25-26, Lund 27-28, e. o. lär. v. Gbgs h. real 28-29, Gbgs h. latin 29-37, e. o. adj. där 38, adj. i latin o. franska v. Hvitfeldtska h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 41. Hvitf. stip. v. Sorbonne i Paris 25. Skr.: avh. o. upps. i facktidskr. o. dagspressen.
translated: Liljeholm, Adolf Filip, high school teacher, Gothenburg, born on 11/5/1883 in Gothenburg to headteacher A. F. L. and Hanna Öhrn. Married on 22/xx/19xx to Karin Linder. Children: Kerstin, born in 1925, Barbro, born in 1926, Elisabeth, born in 1937. Completed his M.A. at Gothenburg high school with a Latin specialization in 1902, Bachelor of Arts at Uppsala in 1907, licentiate of philosophy in Gothenburg in 1925. Completed a probationary year at Gothenburg high school, specializing in the natural sciences, from 1927 to 1928. Temporary high school teacher at Gothenburg high school from 1908 to 1909, teacher at Gustafsberg school from 1922 to 1924, temporary high school teacher in Gothenburg from 1925 to 1926, Lund from 1927 to 1928, assistant teacher in Gothenburg from 1928 to 1929, Gothenburg high school from 1929 to 1937, interim assistant teacher there in 1938, teacher of Latin and French at Hvitfeldtska high school since 1941. Received a scholarship from Hvitfeldtska Foundation for studies at Sorbonne in Paris in 1925. Wrote articles and essays in professional journals and newspapers.
